Reviews.Title: “Excellent!”
Reviews.Author: UmamaMars
Reviews.Content: time rome hotel friendly clean expectations pastry shop ground floor amazing beds nice firm shower top notch arrived late tired babies cranky teenager treated royalty night stay

Reviews.Title: “Well located hotel in pleasant neighbourhood with very helpful, friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: SallyandRichard_10
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 9 days enjoyed time staff helpful friendly stefano reception welcoming useful advice grateful english italian limited ottaviano metro close hotel corner centre town 15 minutes cafes restaurants wine bars minutes walk bakery sharing courtyard hotel especially liked lovely aroma freshly baked pastries mornings breakfast

Reviews.Title: “Lovely Stay, Kind Staff, Clean Accommodations, Safe Neighborhood!”
Reviews.Author: marysoma
Reviews.Content: husband stayed hotel 2010 found delightful host reception desk stefano helpful spoke english bathroom clean quaint cafe time day reception desk neighborhood lovely hotel internet cafe convenient close subway restaurants cinema short walk happy stay hotel recommend

Reviews.Title: “Worst Hotel I have ever experienced - including Asia”
Reviews.Author: crhannaford
Reviews.Content: start obnoxious boorish host rude chamber maid shower earth thin grubby towels smelly overlooking mould rank courtyard internet connection blamed pc mac locations fine lounge saggy uncomfortable beds turfed rain paid extra night charged arranged leave thoroughly horrible dont book
